name: Seven (7)
description:
Complete whole clockwise or counter-clockwise loops to progress. Get past 7 to see one of 5 endings (different text). Post the ending you got below!

Hint: Endings are based on combinations of clockwise and counter-clockwise loops.

Music, character sprites, animations, and gameplay are done by me.

Area sprites are from https://blueapollo.itch.io/oracle-1bit-assets

Made for Black and White game jam 8.
